definitions.title: vb.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. (Baer) [[בְּיַד מְחַללֶי֑ךָ]] Ez Eze 28:9 in the hand of the ones wounding thee (Sm Co rd. [[מְחוֹלְלֶָךָ]]).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְחֻלֲלֵי חֶרֶב]] pierced by the sword Ez Eze 32:26.

definitions.title: Po‘el
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[חׂלֲלָה יׇדוֹ נׇחָשׁ]] [[בָּרִחַ]] Job 26:13 his hand pierced the fleeing serpent; Pt. f. [[מְחוֹלֶלֶת תַּנִּין]] Is 51:9 who pierced the dragon.

definitions.title: Po‘al
definitions.body: Pt. [[מֲחׂלָל מִפְּשָׁעֵינוּ]] Is 53:5 pierced, wounded because of our transgressions (of the servant of ´[[י]], ‖[[מְדֻכָּא מֵעֲוֹנׁתֵינוּ]]).
